org.smpp.WrongSessionStateException

    org.smpp  

    • Uses of WrongSessionStateException in org.smpp

      Methods in org.smpp that throw WrongSessionStateException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Session.alertNotification(AlertNotification request)
      Submits provided SubmitSM PDU to SMSC and returns response to the submission.
      BindResponse Session.bind(BindRequest bindReq)
      Opens connection and binds to SMSC using the bind method provided as bindReq parameter.
      BindResponse Session.bind(BindRequest bindReq, ServerPDUEventListener pduListener)
      Opens connection and binds to SMSC using the bind method provided as bindReq parameter.
      CancelSMResp Session.cancel(CancelSM request)
      Cancels previously submitted message by sending CancelSM PDU to SMSC; returns response to the cancel PDU.
      void Session.checkState(int requestedState)
      Checks if the session is in the state which is required by the parameter.
      void Session.checkState(PDU pdu)
      Checks if the session's state allows sending the PDU provided.
      void Session.close()
      Closes the connection for communication.
      DataSMResp Session.data(DataSM request)
      Submits provided DataSM PDU to SMSC and returns response to the submission.
      DeliverSMResp Session.deliver(DeliverSM request)
      Submits provided DeliverSM PDU to SMSC and returns response to the submission.
      EnquireLinkResp Session.enquireLink()
      Simplified veriosn of enquireLink.
      EnquireLinkResp Session.enquireLink(EnquireLink request)
      Checks the status of connection between ESME and SMSC by sending EnquireLink PDU to SMSC; returns response to the enquiry.
      void Session.genericNack(GenericNack response)
      Sends GenericNack PDU provided as parameter.
      void Session.genericNack(int commandStatus, int sequenceNumber)
      Creates and sends GenericNack PDU with command status and sequence number provided as parameters.
      void Session.open()
      Opens the connection for communication.
      void Session.outbind(Outbind request)
      Sends an outbind PDU over the connection.
      QuerySMResp Session.query(QuerySM request)
      Queries status of previous submission by sending the QuerySM PDU to SMSC; returns the query response.
      ReplaceSMResp Session.replace(ReplaceSM request)
      Replaces previously submitted message by sending ReplaceSM PDU to SMSC and returns response to the replace.
      void Session.respond(Response response)
      Sends a response PDU.
      SubmitSMResp Session.submit(SubmitSM request)
      Submits provided SubmitSM PDU to SMSC and returns response to the submission.
      SubmitMultiSMResp Session.submitMulti(SubmitMultiSM request)
      Submits provided SubmitMultiSM PDU to SMSC and returns response to the submission.
      UnbindResp Session.unbind()
      Stops receiver (if applicable), unbinds from SMSC by sending Unbind PDU, waits for UnbindResp and then closes the connection.
